IMPORT_ITEM.DESCRIPTION:
Create/update OneVizion user accounts, user Trackor records, and user settings
Expected header: UN,EMAIL,IS_DISABLED,MUST_CHANGE_PASSWORD,IS_SUPERUSER, APPLICATION(or APPLICATION_ID or Menu), IS_EXTERNAL_LOGIN,IS_ADD_QUOTE_DELIM,IS_AUTO_SAVE_TB_GRID_CHANGES, CHECKBOX_MODE(or CHECKBOX_MODE_ID),CLICK_ON_PHOTO_MODE(or CLICK_ON_PHOTO_MODE_ID), CONFIG_SESSION,IS_CONFIRM_COLUMN_CLICK, COORDINATE_MODE(or COORDINATE_MODE_ID),DATE_FORMAT,DEFAULT_PAGE(or DEFAULT_PAGE_ID), IS_EXACT_SEARCH_CLIPBOARD,FV_LIST_MODE(or FV_LIST_MODE_ID), FONT_SMOOTHING,IS_COMMENTS_ON_MOUSE_OVER, GRID_EDIT_MODE(or GRID_EDIT_MODE_ID),IS_GROUP_NOTIF_EMAILS, IS_HIDE_START_DATE,IS_MUTE_NEW_EVENTS, APP_LANG_NAME(or APP_LANG_ID), IS_REORDER_TASKS_IN_CSV,IS_SHOW_FORM_NUMBERS, IS_SHOW_TIP_OF_THE_DAY,THOUSANDS_SEPARATOR, TIME_FORMAT,OWNER_XITOR_TYPE, Security Role 1,Security Role 2,Security Role 3, Global Views,Global Filters, Discipline 1,Discipline 2,Discipline 3
Note: UN - is a name of a user; PWD - is a user password, if it is not specified then Administrator can change it from Admin Account page; Security Role - is a name of a security role; APPLICATION (or APPLICATION_ID or Menu) - is a name of an application menu; Global Views - is a boolean parameter to assign global views to a user, it has to be as '0' or '1'; Global Filters - is a boolean parameter to assign global filters to a user, it has to be as '0' or '1'; Discipline - is a name of a discipline. OWNER_XITOR_TYPE - is a name of owner trackor type for user.
Supports import of Config Field values to the User Trackor Supports relations creation between User and parent Trackor Records You have to use Trackor Type Name as Excel column name to create relation between this trackor type and "USER" trackor type To create template file for impor you can use the export data from "Administer account" page and "User" trackor type page
IMPORT_ITEM.NAME: UMGMT-User-Load
